courses.name: Topics in General Studies
courses.description: Experimental and/or interdisciplinary. Subjects and earnable credit may vary from semester to semester.

courses.name: Internship in General Studies
courses.description: Internship limited to students pursuing the Bachelor of General Studies degree. Graded on S/U basis only.

courses.name: Special Project in General Studies
courses.description: With advisor's approval, student works with a faculty member on a major reading, research, or creative project, usually of interdisciplinary nature.

courses.name: Readings in General Studies
courses.description: Independent readings with supervisory faculty member. May be repeated to a maximum of six hours.
courses.prerequisites: Open only to General Studies majors

courses.name: Directed Readings in General Studies
courses.description: Independent readings with supervisory faculty member; this course serves as the student's capstone experience.
courses.prerequisites: Open only to General Studies majors only

courses.name: Internship in General Studies
courses.description: Internship experience which serves as the student's capstone experience.  Program advisor must approve internship.  Section 2 of this course will be designated for Service Learning Capstone experience.  Graded on S/U basis only.
